Module main
Package com.vtuberrush.src.helpers

Class Constants.Enemies

java.lang.Object
com.vtuberrush.src.helpers.Constants.Enemies
Enclosing class:
Constants
public static class Constants.Enemies extends Object
Defines the type of enemy as well as its speed, maximum health, and reward when killed. Each additional level of an enemy increases its health by 250% and increases its reward by ~141% but decreases its speed by 25%.
Version:
0.0.1-alpha.1
Author:
Gio Carlo Ciudadano

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static int
    SLIME_BLUE
    A Blue Slime (Level 2 Slime) has 250 health, 27 speed, and rewards 6 gold.
    static int
    SLIME_GREEN
    A Green Slime (Level 1 Slime) has 100 health, 36 speed, and rewards 4 gold.
    static int
    SLIME_PURPLE
    A Purple Slime (Level 4 Slime) has 1562 health, 15.12 speed, and rewards 11 gold.
    static int
    SLIME_RED
    A Red Slime (Level 3 Slime) has 625 health, 20.28 speed, and rewards 8 gold.
    static int
    SLIME_WHITE
    A White Slime (Level 5 Slime) has 3906 health, 11.14 speed, and rewards 16 gold.

  • Method Details

    • getSpeed

      public static float getSpeed​(int enemyType)
      Returns how fast the enemy travels per tick in pixels based on their type.

      For the amount of pixels the enemy travels per second, multiply the existing speed float by 120.
      Each additional level decreases the speed of an enemy by 25%.

      Parameters:
      enemyType - - The type of enemy inheriting a pre-defined speed constant.
      Returns:
      speed - The speed of the enemy based on their type.

    • getMaxHealth

      public static int getMaxHealth​(int enemyType)
      Returns how much health the enemy has based on their type.

      Each additional increases the health of an enemy by 250%.

      Parameters:
      enemyType - - The type of enemy inheriting a pre-defined health constant.
      Returns:
      health - The amount of health the enemy has based on their type.

    • getReward

      public static int getReward​(int enemyType)
      Returns how much gold is rewarded for killing the specified enemy type.

      Each additional level increases the gold reward by ~141%.

      Parameters:
      enemyType - - The type of enemy inheriting a pre-defined gold reward constant.
      Returns:
      gold - The amount of gold rewarded for killing the enemy based on their type.
